page.title: 20DIALECT
page.content: The Yorkshire dialect spoken here is an easy to listen to soft country accent.It "thickens" as is normal when farmer talks to farmer,housewife to housewife in the local shop,or child to child in the playground.Here are some of the local words_ caid lamb_an orphan lamb calf head_someone who is wooden or thick sup_a drink laking_playing watter_water taters_potatoes scran_a packed lunch balmpot_a silly person thee_ you There must be many more than these but unfortunately as people become more sophisticated these words are becoming obsolete.
